item.title: World’s Rugby’s self-reinforcement on concussion is a problem for the sport | Andy Bull
item.description: World’s Rugby’s self-reinforcement on concussion is a problem for the sport | Andy Bull The latest conference, dominated by sceptics of recent research, will do nothing to bring clarity to the CTE debateAnother week, another conference.
